### Total Score Calculation
The total score is calculated as the average of all element scores:
\[ \text{Total Score} = \frac{\sum \text{Element Scores}}{\text{Number of Elements}} = \frac{10}{6} = 1.666667 \]

This score reflects a moderate level of alignment, with some elements strongly represented and others completely absent or poorly aligned.
